snippet.title: RIVE's SHMUPSTRAVAGANZA Trailer! (Steam, PS4, Wii U, Xbox One)
snippet.description: It's the first RIVE trailer that clearly shows the hacking in action and it has a ton of new content created after the PAX demo. So why wait any longer? Feast your eyes on this! More info? http://www.twotribes.com/press/rive/sheet.php?p=rive
